Package rekit.logic.filters

Class RandomMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • rekit.logic.filters.RandomMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter

    @LoadMe
public final class RandomMode
extends Object
implements Filter
    This filter realizes a filter which will map a color to a random color.
    Author:
    Dominik Fuchss
